snippet: For the quarter ended Aug. 31, the package delivery company expects to earn $1.37 to $1.43 a share, down from an earlier forecast of $1.45 to $1.60 a share.
lead_paragraph: For the quarter ended Aug. 31, the package delivery company expects to earn $1.37 to $1.43 a share, down from an earlier forecast of $1.45 to $1.60 a share.

headline.seo: FedEx Cuts Profit Forecast for Quarter
headline.main: FedEx Cuts Profit Forecast, Citing Weak Global Economy
headline.print_headline: FedEx Cuts Profit Forecast, Citing Weak Global Economy
